Chris Ortega

openNewTab('https://www.linkedin.com/in/chris-ortega-141645184/')} className = 'grow socialmedialinks' src='/static/slinkedin.png' /> openNewTab('https://github.com/mrowl01')} className = 'grow socialmedialinks' src='/static/sgit.png' />

I'm a motivated guy when it comes to tech and web dev. I do a lot of online courses to learn new skills.
If I don't know how to do it I'll learn it.

I started coding for fun using Unity3D and I love practicle things. Web Dev became the next logical step so I started to absorb as much info as I could. I'm still learning there is a lot! Keeps me happy :)

Outside of tech and coding I'm a mma practisioner and I still make games with Unity when I can - exploring VR.

) } } export default Index;
